title.narrative: Pakistan: Third Punjab Education Sector Project

description.narrative: The project development objective is to support Punjab province to improve school participation, completion, and teaching-learning practices with a particular focus on low-performing districts.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
PESRP, School Education Department, Government of Punjab
